{@code UncheckedExecutionException} is intended as an alternative to {@code
addition.26: * ExecutionException} when the exception thrown by a task is an unchecked exception. However, it
addition.27: * may also wrap a checked exception in some cases.
addition.30: * wrapping a checked exception, prefer {@code ExecutionException}.
